com.basho.riak.client.jiak
Class JiakBucketInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.basho.riak.client.RiakBucketInfo
      com.basho.riak.client.jiak.JiakBucketInfo

public class JiakBucketInfo
extends RiakBucketInfo

Adds convenience methods to RiakBucketInfo to set the bucket schema properties specific to the Jiak interface. See Jiak documentation for more information about the meaning of each property.
